message:
More dead as unrest continues in Bangladesh & celebrating victory day  .....

Aljazeera News Airs .....

At least 33 people have been killed in clashes involving opposition, pro-government activists and police since Thursday, when Jamaat-e-Islami leader, Abdul Quader Molla, was put to death for crimes committed during the nation's independence war in 1971.
name: Celebrating Victory day and formed World largest  human flag
